extendedInfo.description: Avril Ramona Lavigne born 27 September 1984 is a Canadian singer-songwriter. She was born in Belleville, Ontario, but spent most of her youth in the small town of Napanee. By the age of 15, she had appeared on stage with Shania Twain; by 16, she had signed a two-album recording contract with Arista Records worth more than $2 million. In 2002, when she was 17 years old, Lavigne broke onto the music scene with her debut album Let GoPlease Note : This is a live wallpaper and not a application, so you won't find a logo on the home screen. To activate live wallpaper please follow the steps1. Download live wallpaper and install. (if download from Google, automatically installed)2. Long press home screen3. Select Wallpaper and then select Live Wallpaper4. Select " Debby Ryan Live Wallpaper " 5 Press Set As WallpaperTags : Avril Lavigne, Avril Live Wallpaper, Music, Pop Songs, Singers, Android, Grande, Avril Wallpaper, Pictures, Images, Background, Icons

reviews.title: Lovely epic awesome avril!
reviews.comment: OMG I love avril soooooooo much she is my all time favorite Singer and what is best of all is that I\'m a skater girl too!!! AVRIL AVRIL AVRIL!!!!!! \342\231\241\342\231\254\342\231\241\342\231\254
